meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>challenge</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to challenge someone</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: <reading>I do</reading>n't (いど) just challenge anyone, but when I challenge someone, it's for real. My challenging reflexes come from my <reading>Id</reading> (いど), after all.
